verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Samuel<WH8050>, How long wilt thou mourn<WH56> for Saul<WH7586>, seeing I have rejected<WH3988> him from being king<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478>? fill<WH4390> thy horn<WH7161> with oil<WH8081>, and go<WH3212>: I will send<WH7971> thee to Jesse<WH3448> the Beth-lehemite<WH1022>; for I have provided<WH7200> me a king<WH4428> among his sons<WH1121>.

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559>, How can I go<WH3212>? if Saul<WH7586> hear<WH8085> it<WH2026>, he will kill me<WH3068>. And Jehovah said<WH559>, Take<WH3947> a heifer<WH1241> with thee<WH3027>, and say<WH559>, I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> to Jehovah<WH3068>.
And call<WH7121> Jesse<WH3448> to the sacrifice<WH2077>, and I will show<WH3045> thee what thou shalt do<WH6213>: and thou shalt anoint<WH4886> unto me him whom I name unto thee<WH559>.

And Samuel<WH8050> did<WH6213> that which Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696>, and came<WH935> to Beth-lehem<WH1035>. And the elders<WH2205> of the city<WH5892> came<WH7125> to meet him trembling<WH2729>, and said<WH559>, Comest<WH935> thou peaceably<WH7965>?

And he said<WH559>, Peaceably<WH7965>; I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: sanctify<WH6942> yourselves<WH935>, and come with me to the sacrifice<WH2077>. And he sanctified<WH6942> Jesse<WH3448> and his sons<WH1121>, and called<WH7121> them to the sacrifice<WH2077>.
And it came to pass<WH935>, when they were come, that he looked<WH7200> on Eliab<WH446>, and said<WH559>, Surely Jehovah<WH3068>'s anointed is before him<WH4899>.

But Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Samuel<WH8050>, Look<WH5027> not on his countenance<WH4758>, or on the height<WH1364> of his stature<WH6967>; because I have rejected<WH3988> him<WH120>: for Jehovah seeth not as man seeth<WH7200>; for man<WH120> looketh<WH7200> on the outward appearance<WH5869>, but Jehovah<WH3068> looketh<WH7200> on the heart<WH3824>.
Then Jesse<WH3448> called<WH7121> Abinadab<WH41>, and made him pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel<WH8050>. And he said<WH559>, Neither hath Jehovah<WH3068> chosen this<WH977>.
Then Jesse<WH3448> made Shammah<WH8048> to pass by<WH5674>. And he said<WH559>, Neither hath Jehovah<WH3068> chosen this<WH977>.

And Jesse<WH3448> made seven<WH7651> of his sons<WH1121> to pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel<WH8050>. And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, Jehovah<WH3068> hath not chosen these<WH977>.

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, Are here all<WH8552> thy children<WH5288>? And he said<WH559>, There remaineth<WH7604> yet the youngest<WH6996>, and<WH7462>, behold, he is keeping the sheep<WH6629>. And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, Send<WH7971> and fetch<WH3947> him<WH5437>; for we will not sit down till he come<WH935> hither<WH6311>.

And he sent<WH7971>, and brought him in<WH935>. Now he was ruddy<WH132>, and withal<WH5973> of a beautiful<WH3303> countenance<WH5869>, and goodly<WH2896> to<WH7210> look upon<WH3068>. And Jehovah said<WH559>, Arise<WH6965>, anoint him<WH4886>; for this is he.

Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> the horn<WH7161> of oil<WH8081>, and anointed<WH4886> him in the midst<WH7130> of his brethren<WH251>: and the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068> came<WH6743> mightily upon David<WH1732> from that day<WH3117> forward<WH4605>. So Samuel<WH8050> rose up<WH6965>, and went<WH3212> to Ramah<WH7414>.
Now the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068> departed<WH5493> from Saul<WH7586>, and an evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from Jehovah<WH3068> troubled him<WH1204>.
And Saul<WH7586>'s servants<WH5650> said<WH559> unto him<WH7451>, Behold now, an evil spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> troubleth thee<WH1204>.

Let our lord<WH113> now command<WH559> thy servants<WH5650>, that are before<WH6440> thee<WH1245>, to seek out a man<WH376> who is a skilful<WH3045> player<WH5059> on the harp<WH3658>: and it shall come to pass<WH7451>, when the evil spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> is upon thee<WH5059>, that he shall play with his hand<WH3027>, and thou shalt be well<WH2895>.
And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> unto his servants<WH5650>, Provide<WH7200> me now a man<WH376> that can play<WH5059> well<WH3190>, and bring him to me<WH935>.

Then answered<WH6030> one<WH259> of the young men<WH5288>, and said<WH559>, Behold<WH7200>, I have seen a son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> the Beth-lehemite<WH1022>, that is skilful<WH3045> in playing<WH5059>, and a mighty<WH1368> man<WH2428> of valor<WH376>, and a man of war<WH4421>, and prudent<WH995> in speech<WH1697>, and a comely<WH8389> person<WH376>; and Jehovah is with him<WH3068>.
Wherefore Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto Jesse<WH3448>, and said<WH559>, Send<WH7971> me David<WH1732> thy son<WH1121>, who is with the sheep<WH6629>.

And Jesse<WH3448> took<WH3947> an ass<WH2543> laden with bread<WH3899>, and a bottle<WH4997> of wine<WH3196>, and a<WH259> kid<WH1423>, and sent<WH7971> them by<WH3027> David<WH1732> his son<WH1121> unto Saul<WH7586>.
And David<WH1732> came<WH935> to Saul<WH7586>, and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him<WH157>: and he loved him greatly<WH3966>; and he became his armorbearer<WH5375>.
And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> to Jesse<WH3448>, saying<WH559>, Let David<WH1732>, I pray thee<WH5975>, stand before<WH6440> me<WH4672>; for he hath found favor<WH2580> in my sight<WH5869>.

And it came to pass<WH7307>, when the evil spirit from God<WH430> was upon Saul<WH7586>, that David<WH1732> took<WH3947> the harp<WH3658>, and played<WH5059> with his hand<WH3027>: so Saul<WH7586> was refreshed<WH7304>, and was well<WH2895>, and the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> departed from him<WH5493>.
